name: MTLStencilOperation
desc: The operation performed on a currently stored stencil value when a comparison test passes or fails.

items.name: case zero
items.desc: Set the stencil value to zero.

items.name: case replace
items.desc: Replace the stencil value with the stencil reference value, which is set by the setStencilReferenceValue(_:) method of MTLRenderCommandEncoder.

items.name: case incrementClamp
items.desc: If the current stencil value is not the maximum representable value, increase the stencil value by one. Otherwise, if the current stencil value is the maximum representable value, do not change the stencil value.

items.name: case decrementClamp
items.desc: If the current stencil value is not zero, decrease the stencil value by one. Otherwise, if the current stencil value is zero, do not change the stencil value.

items.name: case invert
items.desc: Perform a logical bitwise invert operation on the current stencil value.

items.name: case incrementWrap
items.desc: If the current stencil value is not the maximum representable value, increase the stencil value by one. Otherwise, if the current stencil value is the maximum representable value, set the stencil value to zero.

items.name: case decrementWrap
items.desc: If the current stencil value is not zero, decrease the stencil value by one. Otherwise, if the current stencil value is zero, set the stencil value to the maximum representable value.
